nodes.text: Jaina's Light was a CR90 corvette piloted by Han Solo and Chewbacca circa 5 BBY. Solo claimed to Lieutenant Commander Llnewe of the Galactic Empire that it was named after his mother. At the time, the ship was supposedly en route to a small backwater farming world. Solo piloted three separate but identical CR90 corvettes (all bearing the same name) in what turned out to be a ship smuggling operation.
